languages.text: "Разрешите доложить. Ваш {g|Encyclopedia:ProctorGlossary}проктор{/g} моего пустотника задержал и требует казни. Рецидивист, говорит. Прошу вас вмешаться, Лорд-капитан!"

traits.locale_text: "Разрешите доложить. Ваш {g|Encyclopedia:ProctorGlossary}проктор{/g} моего пустотника задержал и требует казни. Рецидивист, говорит. Прошу вас вмешаться, Лорд-капитан!"

languages.text: "Permission to report. Your Proctor has arrested my voidsman and is demanding his execution. A repeat offender, he says. Please do something, Lord Cap'n!"
languages.original_text: "Разрешите доложить. Ваш проктор моего пустотника задержал и требует казни. Рецидивист, говорит. Прошу вас вмешаться, Лорд-капитан!"

traits.locale_text: "Permission to report. Your Proctor has arrested my voidsman and is demanding his execution. A repeat offender, he says. Please do something, Lord Cap'n!"
"Permission to report. Your Proctor has arrested my voidsman and is demanding his execution. A repeat offender, he says. Please do something, Lord Cap'n!"
"Permission to report. Your Proctor has arrested my voidsman and is demanding his execution. A repeat offender, he says. Please do something, Lord Cap'n!"
"Permission to report. Your Proctor has arrested my voidsman and is demanding his execution. A repeat offender, he says. Please do something, Lord Cap'n!"
"Permission to report. Your Proctor has arrested my voidsman and is demanding his execution. A repeat offender, he says. Please do something, Lord Cap'n!"

languages.text: 「報告の許可を願います。代理人が私のヴォイズマンを逮捕し、処刑を要求しています。『再犯者だ』とのことです。ロード・キャプテン、何とかしてください！」
languages.original_text: "Permission to report. Your Proctor has arrested my voidsman and is demanding his execution. A repeat offender, he says. Please do something, Lord Cap'n!"

traits.locale_text: 「報告の許可を願います。代理人が私のヴォイズマンを逮捕し、処刑を要求しています。『再犯者だ』とのことです。ロード・キャプテン、何とかしてください！」

languages.text: "Müsaadenizle raporumu sunuyorum. Üsteğmen bir uçsuz erimi tutukladı. Azılı bir suçlu olduğunu söyleyip kendisinin idam edilmesi talep ediyor. Lütfen bir şeyler yapın Lord Kaptan!"
languages.original_text: "Permission to report. Your Proctor has arrested my voidsman and is demanding his execution. A repeat offender, he says. Please do something, Lord Cap'n!"

traits.locale_text: "Rapor sunmak için izninizi istiyorum. Üsteğmen'iniz, bir uçsuz erimi tutukladı ve azılı bir suçlu olduğunu söyleyerek kendisinin idam edilmesi talep ediyor. Lütfen bir şeyler yapın Lord Kaptan!"

languages.text: «Solicito permiso para informar. Su Procurador ha arrestado a mi infante del vacío y exige su ejecución. Afirma que es un criminal reincidente. ¡Haga algo, Lord Capitán!».
languages.original_text: "Permission to report. Your Proctor has arrested my voidsman and is demanding his execution. A repeat offender, he says. Please do something, Lord Cap'n!"

traits.locale_text: «Solicito permiso para informar. Su Procurador ha arrestado a mi infante del vacío y exige su ejecución. Afirma que es un criminal reincidente. ¡Haga algo, Lord Capitán!».

languages.text: “请求报告，你那个监察官逮捕了我的船员，打算把他处决。他说那个人是个惯犯。求你了，做点什么吧，船长老大！”
languages.original_text: "Permission to report. Your Proctor has arrested my voidsman and is demanding his execution. A repeat offender, he says. Please do something, Lord Cap'n!"

traits.locale_text: “请求报告，你那个监察官逮捕了我的船员，打算把他处决。他说那个人是个惯犯。求你了，做点什么吧，船长老大！”

languages.text: « Permission de faire mon rapport. Votre proctor a arrêté mon cosmomarin et exige son exécution immédiate. Il l'accuse d'être un criminel récidiviste. De grâce, {mf|seigneur-cap'taine|seigneure-cap'taine}, je vous supplie d'intervenir ! »
languages.original_text: "Permission to report. Your Proctor has arrested my voidsman and is demanding his execution. A repeat offender, he says. Please do something, Lord Cap'n!"

traits.locale_text: « Permission de faire mon rapport. Votre proctor a arrêté mon cosmomarin et exige son exécution immédiate. Il l'accuse d'être un criminel récidiviste. De grâce, {mf|seigneur-cap'taine|seigneure-cap'taine}, je vous supplie d'intervenir ! »

languages.text: "Ich muss mit Euch sprechen! Euer Proktor hat meinen Raumfahrer verhaftet und fordert seine Hinrichtung. Er sagt, er wäre ein Wiederholungstäter. Bitte unternehmt etwas, Lord Cap'n!"
languages.original_text: "Permission to report. Your Proctor has arrested my voidsman and is demanding his execution. A repeat offender, he says. Please do something, Lord Cap'n!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss mit Euch sprechen! Euer Proktor hat meinen Raumfahrer verhaftet und fordert seine Hinrichtung. Er sagt, er wäre ein Wiederholungstäter. Bitte unternehmt etwas, Lord Cap'n!"
